dao.name: QRY_ROW_HOURCE_MIN_BATCH_DAT
dao.statement: SELECT MIN(BATCH_DAT) as batchDat FROM RMINV_DT WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND trim(HOTEL_COD) = trim(:hotel_cod) AND BATCH_DAT >= to_date(:batch_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND trim(ROOM_NOS) = trim(:room_nos) AND ASSIGN_STA = 'Y'

dao.name: QRY_FIX_MIN_BATCH_DAT
dao.statement: SELECT MIN(BATCH_DAT) as batchDat FROM RMINV_DT WHERE ATHENA_ID = ? AND trim(HOTEL_COD) = trim(?) AND BATCH_DAT >= ? AND trim(ROOM_NOS) = trim(?) AND ROOM_STA = 'R'

dao.name: QRY_VISIT_MIN_BATCH_DAT
dao.statement: SELECT MIN(BATCH_DAT) as batchDat FROM RMINV_DT WHERE ATHENA_ID = ? AND trim(HOTEL_COD) = trim(?) AND BATCH_DAT >= ? AND trim(ROOM_NOS) = trim(?) AND ROOM_STA = 'S'

dao.name: SEL_ORDERDTROOMCOD
dao.statement: select distinct room_cod value, sf_hfd_get_rvrmcod_rf2(hotel_cod, room_cod, batch_dat, 'ROOM_SNA', athena_id) display, PG_HFD_OTHER2.PF_GET_ROOM_COD_ORDER(athena_id,hotel_cod, room_cod) view_seq from rminv_mn t where batch_dat between to_date(:ci_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') and to_date(:co_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') and athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) order by PG_HFD_OTHER2.PF_GET_ROOM_COD_ORDER(athena_id,hotel_cod, room_cod)
